priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Reproductive System Findings Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C106478

self.title: CDISC SDTM Reproductive System Findings Test Name Terminology

definition: A terminology codelist for the physiological test names related to the male and female reproductive systems.
name: Reproductive System Findings Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Reproductive System Findings Test Name Terminology

terms.definition: The method by which conception or impregnation is prevented.
An indicator as to whether the female subject has the potential to become pregnant. (NCI)
The age at which the first menstruation event occurred. (NCI)
The age at which permanent cessation of menses occurred. (NCI)
The status of a female with respect to menopause.
The length of time of the menses cycle, measured from the beginning of one menstrual period to the beginning of the next.
A measurement of the total number of instances in which there has been a spontaneous termination of pregnancy (miscarriage) or elective termination of pregnancy.
A measurement of the total number of live-born offspring a female has delivered.
A measurement of the total number of pregnancy events experienced by a female.
An indicator as to whether a female is pregnant during the study period. (NCI)
